long_description: With its 3 x 3 in. water-resistant plastic letter tiles, Jumbo Bananagrams is a great game for families and friends at the beach or campground, or in the backyard. Tiles are first placed face down; players choose tiles, then race to see who can use up their tiles first by creating words in a giant crossword grid. No pencil, paper or board is required. Designed for 1-8 players, ages 7 and older. Jumbo Bananagrams Game includes letter tiles and a zip-closed banana-shaped carry pouch.
short_description: With its 3 x 3 in. water-resistant plastic letter tiles, Jumbo Bananagrams is a great game for families and friends at the beach or campground, or in the backyard.
